# [Interview #1120: Brandon Sanderson RAFOlympics at JordanCon 8, Entry #4](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1120#4)

#### Question

Is Kelsier still alive during Mistborn Era 2?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO.
